text.0: may sūrya guard us out of heaven and vāta from the firmament.
text.2: thou savitar whose flame deserves hundred libations be thou pleased.
text.3: from failing lightning keep us safe.
text.4: may savitar the god and may parvata also give us sight.
text.5: may the creator give us sight.
text.6: give sight unto our eye give thou our bodies sight that they may see.
text.7: may we survey discern this world.
text.8: thus sūrya may we look on thee on thee most lovely to behold.
text.9: see clearly with the eyes of men.
